Affliction.name: ouch oof
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were caught in a blowout.

Affliction.name: oof ouch
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were caught in a blowout.

Affliction.name: Blowout Sequence
Affliction.description: A blowout sequence is imminent. Seek shelter.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were caught in a blowout.

Affliction.name: Survived a Blowout
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were caught in a blowout.

Affliction.name: Blowout Sequence
Affliction.description: You got caught in a blowout and you are now unconscious.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were caught in a blowout.

Affliction.name: Check for Radiation
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: you couldn't handle the rads

Affliction.name: Check for Vitality
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: you couldn't handle the rads

Affliction.name: Braincharred
Affliction.description: The patient is covered head-to-toe in third-degree burns, and is very clearly deceased.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were caught in a blowout.

Affliction.name: Deceased Shambler
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have decayed into a shambler. If you were a zombie before, you can grab someone by pressing your creature attack button on them while overlapping them. Doing so will cause you to repeatedly bite them, until they either die or smack you off of them.

Affliction.name: Adrenaline Rush
Affliction.description: Epinephrine, Atropine, and saline in your bloodstream kickstarts regeneration and increases muscle strength, while also providing heavy stun resistance. Once this wears off, you will crash and fall unconscious, taking a bit of organ damage.

Affliction.name: Seeker
Affliction.description: You are nearing the Seeker. Proceed with caution.

Affliction.name: Tenderizer's Attack
Affliction.description: You are being pummeled by a tenderizer.

Affliction.name: Bleeder's Attack
Affliction.description: You are being mauled by a bleeder.

Affliction.name: functionalnecrosisdeathtracker
Affliction.description: Someone infected died before your very eyes.

Affliction.name: Dragging
Affliction.description: God, what happened to this place?

Affliction.name: Nanite Swarm Program: 'Stun' bomb
Affliction.description: Crowd control meets warcrimes. This brutal nanobot swarm will rapidly eat the insides of anything that moves. The nanobots disintegrate after 35 seconds without consuming living matter. It's gained the nickname, 'Stunbomb' due to the fact that it immediately knocks out those it infests, keeping them alive for 30 seconds. Applying 5 seconds of stun will save the subject. The infection spreads when the nanites violently eject from the target post-mortem.

Affliction.name: Grappled
Affliction.description: A zombie has grabbed you and is actively biting into you! Smack it with a melee weapon to get it off of you!

Affliction.name: Streptococcus Lyssavirus Exposure
Affliction.description: You are being exposed to Streptococcus Lyssavirus.

Affliction.name: Swarm After-Effects
Affliction.description: drippin at the cost of your life

Affliction.name: Swarmed
Affliction.description: A horde of zombies have grabbed you and are eating you alive! Call for help, you can't get them off of you by yourself now!

Affliction.name: Grappled
Affliction.description: A zombie has grabbed you and is actively biting into you! Smack it with a melee weapon to get it off of you!

Affliction.name: Short-Term Infection
Affliction.description: Going into crit will turn you into a zombie.

Affliction.name: Headshot
Affliction.description: The patient's brain matter is no longer present.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: Your brain was just splattered against the wall.

Affliction.name: Calm
Affliction.description: You've got pills, no need to worry..

Affliction.name: Calm Start
Affliction.description: You've got pills, no need to worry..

Affliction.name: Calm Start 2
Affliction.description: You've got pills, no need to worry..

Affliction.name: Gene Therapy
Affliction.description: You're experiencing the negative side effects of Gene Therapy.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were too weak to handle Gene Therapy.

Affliction.name: Immune to Medicine
Affliction.description: The patient is completely immune to medicine and poison, and appears to be able to regenerate on their own.

Affliction.name: Genetic Reshuffle
Affliction.description: You're experiencing the negative side effects of Gene Therapy.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were too weak to handle Gene Therapy.

Affliction.name: Genetic Reshuffle: Pursuer
Affliction.description: You're experiencing the negative side effects of Gene Therapy.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were too weak to handle Gene Therapy.

AfflictionHusk.name: Genome: Pursuer
AfflictionHusk.description: You feel a strong desire to harm others. You're fragile, but a lot stronger and faster, without a need for air. Hunt your friends down.
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were too weak to handle Gene Therapy.

Affliction.name: Genome: Medproof Regenerator
Affliction.description: You can rapidly regenerate now. Medicine does not work on you, and you can inject random toxins into people.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were too weak to handle Gene Therapy.

Affliction.name: Genome: Skittish Evader
Affliction.description: You're a lot faster, but a lot more fragile. Careful not to get grabbed..
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were too weak to handle Gene Therapy.

Affliction.name: Genome: Resistant Bouncer
Affliction.description: You're a lot slower and have trouble seeing right, but you're a tough nut to crack. You can tank a lot more damage and very slowly regenerate.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were too weak to handle Gene Therapy.

Affliction.name: Genome: Europan Seacreature
Affliction.description: You do not need to breathe, and do not care about the water. Being in the air without closed internals damages you.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were too weak to handle Gene Therapy.

Affliction.name: Genetic Reshuffle: Medproof Regenerator
Affliction.description: You're experiencing the negative side effects of Gene Therapy.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were too weak to handle Gene Therapy.

Affliction.name: Genetic Reshuffle: Skittish Evader
Affliction.description: You're experiencing the negative side effects of Gene Therapy.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were too weak to handle Gene Therapy.

Affliction.name: Genetic Reshuffle: Resistant Bouncer
Affliction.description: You're experiencing the negative side effects of Gene Therapy.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were too weak to handle Gene Therapy.

Affliction.name: Genetic Reshuffle: Europan Seacreature
Affliction.description: You're experiencing the negative side effects of Gene Therapy.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You were too weak to handle Gene Therapy.

Affliction.name: Braindead
Affliction.description: The patient is completely unresponsive. Any recovery is unlikely.
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to functional necrosis.

AfflictionHusk.name: Zombie Crawler
AfflictionHusk.description: The patient is bleeding from their eyes and convulsing violently on the floor.
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to functional necrosis.

AfflictionHusk.name: Functional Necrosis
AfflictionHusk.description: Your time is running quite short.
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to functional necrosis.

AfflictionHusk.name: Necrotic Reanimation
AfflictionHusk.description: The patient is bleeding from their eyes and convulsing violently on the floor.
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to functional necrosis.

AfflictionHusk.name: Knox Reanimation
AfflictionHusk.description: The patient is bleeding from their eyes and convulsing violently on the floor.
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to the Knox Infection.

Affliction.name: Tunes Manager
Affliction.description: Manages the tunes. This affliction will play different music and ambient tracks depending on certain conditions.

Affliction.name: Skin-Eating Bacteria
Affliction.description: The patient exhibits symptoms of severe pain and reports hearing sounds others do not. Necrosis is prevalent throughout some of their body, and they appear to have some trouble moving. Potential skin-eating bacteria?

Affliction.name: Brain-Eating Bacteria
Affliction.description: The patient has no pulse, and exhibits symptoms of paranoia, psychosis, and general erratic behavior. Necrosis is prevalent throughout their entire body, and they have trouble moving. Is this really a bacteria?

AfflictionHusk.name: Streptococcus Lyssavirus
AfflictionHusk.description: The patient has no pulse, and exhibits symptoms of paranoia, impulsivity, aggression, psychosis, and general erratic behavior. Necrosis is prevalent throughout their entire body, and they have trouble moving. A viral bacteria commonly referred to as 'The Great Decay', which is treatable with broad-spectrum antibiotics in the early stages. The patient has little time left.
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have decayed into a shambler. If you were a zombie before, you'll control the shambler. You can grab someone by using your creature attack when within a very short range of them. You will bite them repeatedly from there, until they either die or smack you off of them with a blunt weapon.

Affliction.name: Shambler Decay
Affliction.description: The patient appears to be decaying and slowing down...
Affliction.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You decayed into nothing.

AfflictionHusk.name: (Error-Causing) Horde Reanimation
AfflictionHusk.description: The patient is bleeding from their eyes and convulsing violently on the floor.
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to functional necrosis.

AfflictionHusk.name: (Error-Causing) Decay
AfflictionHusk.description: The patient is bleeding from their eyes and convulsing violently on the floor.
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to functional necrosis.

AfflictionHusk.name: Horde Reanimation
AfflictionHusk.description: The patient is bleeding from their eyes and convulsing violently on the floor.
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to functional necrosis.

AfflictionHusk.name: Dread Reanimation
AfflictionHusk.description: The patient is convulsing violently on the floor.
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to functional necrosis.

AfflictionHusk.name: Brutal Reanimation
AfflictionHusk.description: The patient is convulsing violently on the floor.
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to functional necrosis.

AfflictionHusk.name: Frostbitten Reanimation
AfflictionHusk.description: The patient is convulsing violently on the floor. The air grows colder around you.
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to functional necrosis.

AfflictionHusk.name: Bloody Reanimation
AfflictionHusk.description: The patient is convulsing violently on the floor, spewing blood.
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to functional necrosis.

Affliction.name: Festering Infection
Affliction.description: Your wounds fester with infection. If this affliction gets to full, you'll be infected.

AfflictionHusk.name: Knox Infection
AfflictionHusk.description: You are fucked. There is no cure for this.
AfflictionHusk.selfcauseofdeathdescription: You have succumbed to the Knox Infection.

Affliction.name: Old Scratch
Affliction.description: An old scratch, almost looks like teeth could have made it. It should be fine...

Affliction.name: Old Bite Mark
Affliction.description: An old bite mark... Looks almost human..?

Affliction.name: Seeker's Hypothermia
Affliction.description: You're freezing. Movement speed is slowed, and you periodically take damage in the extremities due to frostbite.

Affliction.name: Borrowed Time
Affliction.description: The symptoms of Functional Necrosis are suppressed temporarily. Once this goes away, the symptoms will return. Your healing is increased slightly.

Affliction.name: VIRAL SUPPRESSANT PRESENT :: SECONDS REMAINING
Affliction.description: You have heightened healing, and symptoms of diseases are suppressed.
